name: Potato Mash
description:
Potatoes are fed up with being mashed into mush! Help them take revenge by growing a huge network of roots and poison the earth, potato style. How deep / how long / how many branches can you get?

Mash space/enter/left mouse button to grow.  To play again, refresh the page (sorry, I want to fix this, but I was already 10min late submitting due to the unity build failing 5x in a row - I'm not sure if its ok to upload this type of fixes)

This game was made in 4 days for Weekly Game Yam 165 - this is my second published game ever :) - I'd love to get feedback!

Stuff not created by me: a tree +  rock illustration, those are under a Public Domain License. The two pictures at the start (both desaturated), one under CC-BY-CA 4 and one in Public domain.
